title: TEASER - The 6th Yohsin Lecture: A conversation with NOAM CHOMSKY
description:
Much Awaited Announcement: The 6th Yohsin Lecture!

A conversation with Dr. Noam Chomsky premieres on his 92nd birthday, December 7, 2020 at 6pm.
